This multigit repo is the luapowerâ€™s meta-package. It contains the .origin files of all the official luapower packages which enables mgit clone-all, mgit ls-all and ./lp ls-all.

It also contains various luapower-specific mgit plugins useful for building packages and working with git (type mgit in the luapower dir for info on those) and luapower-cat.md which enables the luapower module to categorize packages for the website.
